body: Marid style emulates the fluid strength of flowing rivers and the cold of the ocean depths. Masters of the style can withstand severe cold, manipulate water to lash at enemies from afar, and freeze their foes in place.Feat Path: Marid Style, Marid Spirit, Marid Coldsnap.
